name: Wardu
description: The Wardu is a Medium-sized aberration known for its blend of magical abilities and evasive maneuverability. It possesses a segmented central eye and a long proboscis that it uses to attack.
memorable: The Wardu can inflict debilitating conditions on its foes while healing itself through its attacks, making it a challenging opponent.
goals: To debilitate enemies and sustain itself in combat through its attacks.
relations: May be encountered alongside other aberrations or magical creatures.
environment: Often found in mystical or corrupted locales where magic is prevalent.
strengths: Strong magical resistance and ability to inflict various debilitating conditions on opponents.
weaknesses: Lack of physical movement on the ground limits its combat engagement options.
attacks: Uses a multiattack strategy that includes a magical gaze followed by a melee proboscis attack.
most_powerful_ability: Segmented Gaze, which can debilitate opponents with conditions like blinded or incapacitated.
additional_information: Immune to exhaustion and the prone condition.
Regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt with its proboscis attack.
Has Flyby ability to avoid opportunity attacks while flying.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells.
Targets attacked may suffer disadvantage on concentration checks if they are spellcasters.
test_queries: creature with magical resistance and flying speed
aberration that debuffs enemies and heals itself
creature that inflicts conditions with its gaze
mobile monster immune to exhaustion in battle
proboscis attack that restores health when hitting
